mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IDADMINMBER( USER_ID, USER_SE_CODE, PASSWORD, USER_NM, EMAIL_ADRES, PHONE_NUMBER, USER_SPACE_INFO ) VALUES( NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'ID연구소' )
mapper.update: UPDATE IDADMINMBER SET USER_ID = 'test', USER_SE_CODE = 'test', PASSWORD = NULL, USER_NM = NULL, EMAIL_ADRES = NULL, PHONE_NUMBER = NULL, USER_SPACE_INFO = 'ID연구소'
mapper.select: select USER_ID, USER_SE_CODE, password, USER_NM, EMAIL_ADRES, PHONE_NUMBER, USER_SPACE_INFO from IDADMINMBER limit 10 offset 0
